introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this video is はなよめ which you will often hear in wedding contexts. Imagine how much more natural your Japanese will sound when you can say things like 'The bride looked beautiful today', 'She is my best friend and a lovely bride', and 'The bride and groom are ready to start their new life' in Japanese. Let's get started!
meaning_explanation_english: The word はなよめ means 'bride' in English, referring to a woman on her wedding day or in the process of getting married.

common_words: 片付ける: to put in order

kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the はなよめ are よめ and はなよめさん. よめ generally refers to a wife or bride, but it's more casual and can be used in various contexts beyond weddings. On the other hand, はなよめさん is a more respectful and formal way to refer to a bride, often used in wedding contexts.
antonyms: 花婿 : はなむこ : bridegroom
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the はなよめ are はなむこ. はなむこ means 'groom' in English and refers specifically to the man getting married, contrasting with はなよめ, which focuses on the bride's role in the wedding.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼女は花嫁衣装を着ています。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は花嫁衣装(はなよめいしょう)を着(き)ています。

translations.EN: She is wearing a wedding dress.
translations.ES: Ella está usando un vestido de novia.
translations.VI: Cô ấy đang mặc váy cô dâu.
translations.FR: Elle porte une robe de mariée.
translations.BN: সে বউয়ের একটি পোশাক পরিধান করছে。
translations.TL: Naka suot siya ng damit pangkasal.
translations.MY: သူမသည် မင်္ဂလာဆောင် ဝတ်စုံ ဝတ်ဆင်နေသည်။
translations.HI: वह दुल्हन के कपड़े पहन रही है।

example_sentences.kanji: 花嫁の父はとても優しいです。
example_sentences.furigana: 花嫁(はなよめ)の父(ちち)はとても優しい(やさしい)です。

translations.EN: The bride's father is very kind.
translations.ES: El padre de la novia es muy amable.
translations.VI: B父 của cô dâu rất tốt bụng.
translations.FR: Le père de la mariée est très gentil.
translations.TL: Ang ama ng ikakasal ay napakahusay.
translations.MY: ဇနီး၏ဖခင်သည်အလွန်ကျေးဇူးပြုသည်။
translations.HI: दुल्हन के पिता बहुत दयालु हैं।

example_sentences.kanji: 花嫁は手紙を書きました。
example_sentences.furigana: 花嫁（はなよめ）は手紙（てがみ）をを書（か）きました。

translations.VI: Cô dâu đã viết một bức thư.
translations.FR: La mariée a écrit une lettre.
translations.MY: နာမည်ကြီး အိမ်ထောင်သမားက စာရေးခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 花嫁がパーティーに行きます。
example_sentences.furigana: 花嫁(はなよめ)がパーティーに行(い)きます。

translations.EN: The bride is going to the party.
translations.ES: La novia va a la fiesta.
translations.VI: Cô dâu đi đến bữa tiệc.
translations.FR: La mariée va à la fête.
translations.TL: Ang ikakasal ay pupunta sa party.
translations.MY: လက်ထပ်ထာဝရအမျိုးသမီးသည်ပါတီသို့သွားနေသည်။
translations.HI: दुल्हन पार्टी में जा रही है।

example_sentences.kanji: 花嫁の小物はとてもかわいいです。
example_sentences.furigana: 花嫁(はなよめ)の小物(こもの)はとてもかわいいです。

translations.EN: The bride’s accessories are very cute.
translations.ES: Los accesorios de la novia son muy lindos.
translations.VI: Đồ trang sức của cô dâu thì rất dễ thương.
translations.FR: Les accessoires de la mariée sont très mignons.
translations.TL: Napaka-cute ng mga aksesory ng bride.
translations.HI: ब्रह्मा के छोटे सामान बहुत प्यारे हैं।
translations.FA: اکسسوری های عروس بسیار زیبا هستند.

example_sentences.kanji: 花嫁の友人が来ました。
example_sentences.furigana: 花嫁(はなよめ)の友人(ゆうじん)が来(き)ました。

translations.ES: Vino la amiga de la novia.
translations.VI: Bạn của cô dâu đã đến.
translations.FR: L'ami de la mariée est venu.
translations.MY: တိုက်ခန်းမင်္ဂလာဆောင်ကျောင်းသားလာပါသည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は新婚(しんこん)花嫁(はなよめ)です。

translations.ES: Ella es una novia recién casada.
translations.VI: Cô ấy là cô dâu mới cưới.
translations.TL: Siya ay bagong kasal na bride.
translations.MY: သူမသည် အသစ်အထောင်ကျခဲ့သော သားနားဖြစ်သည်။
translations.FA: او یک عروس تازه عروسی است.
